item.title: Introducing LaLa: The Future of Hassle-Free Stays in Kigali
item.description:
{ .img-fluid }

Your next stay in Kigali just got easier! ‚ú®
Meet LaLa, the go-to platform for seamless, reliable, and secure short-term rentals in Kigali.

üè° Why Choose LaLa?

item.title: How LaLa is Revolutionizing Short-Term Rentals in Kigali
item.description:
{ .img-fluid .mb-5 }

üè° A Smarter Way to Book Your Stay in Kigali

Finding the perfect short-term rental in Kigali has never been easier! LaLa is changing the way travelers and locals book accommodations by offering flexible stays, secure payments, and a hassle-free experience.

üöÄ What Makes LaLa Different?

‚úÖ Instant Booking ‚Äì No waiting, no back-and-forth, just secure and instant confirmations.
‚úÖ Verified Listings ‚Äì Every home, apartment, or villa is personally checked for quality.
‚úÖ Secure Payments ‚Äì Pay with confidence using our trusted payment system.
‚úÖ Flexible Stays ‚Äì Book for a night, a week, or even a month‚ÄîLaLa adapts to you!

item.title: Why Property Owners are Choosing LaLa to List Their Homes

LaLa isn’t just about booking stays‚Äîit‚Äôs also empowering property owners to earn more. üè°
If you own a home, apartment, or guesthouse in Kigali, LaLa makes it easy to list, manage, and profit from your space.

üíº Why Property Owners Love LaLa ‚úÖ Maximize Your Income ‚Äì List your property and start earning from short-term rentals.
‚úÖ Easy & Hassle-Free ‚Äì We handle the bookings, payments, and guest support for you.
‚úÖ Trusted by Guests ‚Äì Verified users and secure transactions ensure peace of mind.
‚úÖ Total Control ‚Äì Set your own availability, pricing, and house rules.

item.title: Hugo v0.100.2
item.description:
{ .img-fluid .mb-5 }

This release is mostly motivated by the fix for the panic experienced by people having blackfriday configured as defaultMarkdownHandler (#9968). The Blackfriday support was removed in Hugo v0.100.0 after being deprecated with a warning for a long time.

v0.100.1 fix panic with markdownify/RenderString with shortcode on Page with no content file.

$page.RenderString (see #6703) finally supports shortcodes, and shortcode improvements is the main theme in Hugo 0.100.0.

item.title: Hugo Bootstrap Theme alpha
item.description:
Hugo theme for a secure, blazing fast and SEO-ready static website, using Bootstrap 5.

Open-source MIT Licensed Hugo Theme, using Bootstrap 5.

  • üõ°Ô∏è Security aware

    Get A+ scores on Mozilla Observatory out of the box. Easily change the default Security Headers to suit your needs.

  • ‚ö° Fast by default

    Get 100 scores on Google Lighthouse by default. Hugo Bootstrap Theme removes unused css, prefetches links, and lazy loads images.

item.title: Hugo v0.99.1
item.description:
